summary: This document is an email from July 1, 2020, listing the siblings of Ghislaine Maxwell, including their dates of birth, addresses, and travel history. It appears to be an intelligence or background briefing on her family members, noting their residences and international travel.

keyFacts: The document lists eight siblings of Ghislaine Maxwell: Christine, Isabel, Karine (deceased), Ann (Anne), Kevin, Michael (deceased), Ian, and Philip.

Several siblings have UK passports and travel history between the US and UK, including Ann Maxwell (flight to UK in 2015), Kevin Maxwell (flight to Boston in 2020), and Ian Maxwell (flight to London in 2017).
The document appears to be an intelligence or background briefing on Ghislaine Maxwell's family, compiled in July 2020, indicating ongoing interest in her associates.
Two siblings, Karine and Michael Maxwell, are noted as deceased.
The document includes specific passport numbers for Ann, Kevin, and Ian Maxwell, suggesting access to official travel or identification records.
